QuestData.Title: Inside the Frozen Citadel
QuestData.Description: $C! Come close quickly, I must have a word!$B$BMy patron, the Lady Jaina Proudmoore, has uncovered a hole in the defenses of Icecrown Citadel into a place she referred to as "The Forge of Souls." She sent word before she left for me to find any help that I could... and, well, I was hoping that might be you.$B$BPlease, find her there as soon as you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter The Forge of Souls from the side of Icecrown Citadel and find Lady Jaina Proudmoore.
